recipes.name: Lobsters

sources.notes: Best F2P fishing spot. Use Fishing rod and Bait.

sources.method: Buy Raw Lobsters from Grand Exchange

recipes.cooking_method: Use range in Cooking Guild (requires Cooking level 32 to enter)
recipes.notes: Good mid-level food. Heals 12 HP. Easy to obtain and cook.

recipes.name: Swordfish

sources.notes: Best F2P fishing spot. Use Harpoon.

sources.method: Buy Raw Swordfish from Grand Exchange

recipes.cooking_method: Use range in Cooking Guild (requires Cooking level 32 to enter)
recipes.notes: Better healing than Lobsters. Heals 14 HP. Requires Fishing level 50.

recipes.name: Sharks

sources.method: Fish Sharks at Fishing Guild (Fishing level 76)
sources.notes: Best P2P fishing spot. Requires Fishing Guild access (Fishing level 68). Use Harpoon.
Alternative location if you don't have Fishing Guild access. Use Harpoon.

sources.method: Buy Raw Sharks from Grand Exchange

recipes.cooking_method: Use range in Cooking Guild (requires Cooking level 32 to enter)
recipes.notes: Best high-level food. Heals 20 HP. Requires Fishing level 76 and Cooking level 80. Expensive but very effective.
